website_summaries.verdict: This exquisitely crafted crystal glass nail file makes it easy to grow and shape beautiful, natural nails. Scores top marks for its gentle, salon-quality efficacy.
pros: Produces a smooth edge without breaking, tearing, or chipping nails
Pointed tip easily files around cuticles
cons: Although rare, a handful of users feel that the texture of crystal glass produces a “nails on chalkboard” feeling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long natural nails
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I don't think I can ever go back to the classic emery board nail files. This shaped my natural, very long nails beautifully without wearing down unlike classic emery boards. I love that it is reusable and all I have to do is rinse it off after use. I could easily shape my nails coffin, almond, or square (coffin being my preferred shape). I would recommend this to anybody who likes to file/shape their nails. I think that it's great for all nail types.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Kaneshiro

customer_reviews.title: smooth action
customer_reviews.text: This nail file has a real smooth action to it, and does a really great job filing my nails quickly and smoothly. However, if my nails are very short, I have a hard time getting the file under my nail because the file has a rather thick edge (1⁄8 inch). Also, with the thickness of the point at the end, you cannot use it to clean under the nail. The case is plastic, but does a good job of protecting the file and stays closed in my manicure basket.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Left me empty and confused
customer_reviews.text: Interesting concept but I could not get a crisp even finish. I found it filed my nails unevenly despite how it held It or the pressure I used . It’s also a thick file... does not work well for those who need to keep their nails at a shorter length . Overall I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rafikizuri

customer_reviews.title: Finally a file that works
customer_reviews.text: I love this file. I had no idea the Emery boards I was using (among other things) was causing my nails to peel. So I started researching, and I came upon this file. It neatly and quickly files and shapes my nails without leaving any ragged edges, I can clean under my nails, and if I'm very gentle, I use it to clean up around my cuticle to remove little bits of skin. My nails have improved tremendously. Love the case this comes in. Now I just need to purchase 3 more to have in all my needed places. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Color
customer_reviews.text: When you order Pink case with Pink & Yellow file and receive the Purple case with blue & green file, you're already disappointed. Picture verifies it all! And, the label on the item reads Yellow & Pink with Case - Good Grief. May seem like a small thing to some but there are others who do not care for Purple - I, being one of them.... ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. From Coldwater, MS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money, this file sucks
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. First of all, you can find better files at the $1 store. Don’t waste $10 on this crappy file, it had zero tread on it and it’s non returnable. WILL NEVER PURCHASE AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: racine rich

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: There is something's a weird smell when you use this, but overall it's a great product! I have a little bit of a hard time within the feeling of rubbing my nails on glass, but it works well enough that I can suffer through it. It really does keep your nails from chipping and fraying, unlike a traditional nail file. I also love the case it came in, makes it super easy to stick on your purse of makeup bag
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! I love this nail file!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I LOVE this nail file! I have very brittle nails that break and snag easily so I have to file often. This file is soft so doesn’t harshly file my nails, but also does a fantastic job of smoothing the edges! I will never buy another kind of file again !
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Impossibly Smooth Edge
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a nail file like this before! I'm growing mine out after 20 years of acrylics and this file is helping by not filing too much off at once and preventing snags or splits because the edge it leaves is impossibly smooth ! Won't use another type of file again !
customer_reviews.author: Darla Siener

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: So, this nail filer really does last. It has been months and it still works great. i did drop it once and it chipped a little, but it is glass so I should have been more careful. Great Product. Definitely worth it, and way better than disposable ones if you are getting one for yourself, do it!
customer_reviews.author: rosa candelario

customer_reviews.title: Too Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. Last longer than any of my prior nail files but for the price it's not worth it. The case broke soon after receiving it so now it won't stay closed and it works good but for the price I would be just as happy to file my nails with the old files.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: This is a glass file, Breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about six weeks used it may be a dozen times and it broke in half. It works great when it worked but obviously breaking in half, not because it was dropped just randomly broke. I would stick with something more traditional!
customer_reviews.author: Bell Halton

customer_reviews.title: Makes a wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: I love glass nail files, but they break easily in my purse. This file in a case is protected and handy. They make good, inexpensive gifts, too, and everyone who gets one loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best nail file to have on hand. Glass file in a protective case. It is not only attractive -- it works fast & smooth -- never cutting my skin for close filing. Great buy -- and fantastic price. These make excellent gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Safely, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This was a stocking stuffer for my mom for Christmas. I wanted to replace her cardboard emory boards, and this does a good job. I have shortish finger nails, and didn't have an issue trying it out like other reviewers said. It may be tough to use if you like to keep your finger nails as short as they can go.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Renae

customer_reviews.title: Efficiently shapes smooth nails
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well (and efficiently!) on my nails. Left them feeling really nice and smooth, and the ends never peeled afterwards. Easy to clean, too! It was also nice that it came in a little protective case. I recently dropped it off my desk, shattering it into pieces (it was inevitable; I am a klutz). What a difference it was, being forced to go back to using the crappy metal filer attached to my nail clipper! I am definitely going to order another of these filers as soon as I can!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna N. Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Glass nail files smoothes the edges without splintering your nails
customer_reviews.text: I love how this glass nail file smooths the edges of my nails. In contrast, emery boards would cause the tips of my nails to splinter. I would have to keep filing in an attempt to smooth them, but then I would end up filing them down shorter than I wanted. The glass file also comes with a nice case for storage..
customer_reviews.author: marlene robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great file.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Nice nail file. I love the glass nail files because they have a finer grit and are better for my weak nails. The case is an added benefit. These nail files are easily broken so the case is a welcome addition. Love the pink color. I don't think the glass files last as long as regular files since it looks like the grit is somehow added after the file is shaped but have not had this long enough to gage it's lasting power. So far love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Thick crystal
customer_reviews.text: The crystal is thicker than I would have liked. It makes it hard to get close to the nail in some areas. Also, when using this one it makes the nails scrapping noise which the other brand I purchased does not. It will be my back-up file which is personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shamrock

customer_reviews.title: This file works well and leaves a smooth edge.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a single file that works and leaves a smooth edge. This is going in my purse from now on. I love that it comes with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and saves money!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, had it for years so far and it is true it does not wear out unlike emery boards, in the long run you save money!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Superior nail file
customer_reviews.text: After I lost my first crystal nail file, I had to replace it. This file seems to work better than my other one, and has an excellent protective case. Ever since I started using a crystal nail file, I realize how superior it is to the usual metal or cardboard nail files.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: A winner in my eyes, and most likely another purchase down the road
customer_reviews.text: I've fallen in love with crystal nail files. They seem more gentle than others, yet are perfectly effective. I also like the sleek metal case. A previous product I tried had a plastic tube that cracked at the top that I had to mend to keep the plug in place.
customer_reviews.author: Speaglet Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Files very smoothly! Comes in a nice protective “half” case, fitting over the file, but not the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste D

customer_reviews.title: Mom loved it!  Works gently on her nails!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Mom. Her nails a soft and break easy. She wanted a file that would be gentle on her nails. My Mom loved it! She was impressed by the case. She even loved the box it came in! Mom says it works perfectly! It was exactly what she was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Noelia T.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these nail files. Best I have every used. They leave nails feeling extremely smooth. Works great for tough toenails too. They come in a nice case and make nice small gifts. Gave to both of my daughters-in-law and they love them too. So, purchased another for my granddaughter. Made a believer out of me and will always purchase these in future.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: The best nail file!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 65 years old and have been searching for the best file for years! This thing is great. Files the nail very smoothly and doesn't split. I love it and am ordering one for a friends birthday. This thing will last forever so will have to will it to one of my daughter in laws. :)
customer_reviews.author: KEB

customer_reviews.title: Great nail file
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for myself back into 2015. I ordered a file for my friend last month. Mine is still in great shape, and the one for my friend appears to be as good as quality. As usual, prime delivery so it was quick to receive
customer_reviews.author: Jay Heat

customer_reviews.title: ClassyLady Professional Nail File with eCherryPick
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my husband one and he loved it so much, so I shared it once to see if I wanted one of my own!!! Well, I was so amazed at the results of a beautiful smooth cut it gave me, so I ordered one of my own!!!! Thanks Amazon for providing such a great item, but I have been happy with all my orders!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Campbell

customer_reviews.title: tried it tonight and so far love it. especially like the pink case that the ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered this crystal nail file because supposedly you can file right to left and left to right without any ragged edges. tried it tonight and so far love it. especially like the pink case that the file arrived with..this will help me find in easier when either in my purse or with my other cosmetics. sorry I did not order this sooner
customer_reviews.author: P. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing nail file
customer_reviews.text: Great nail file. I had acrylic nails that had gotten too long for typing. Since I couldn't cut them, I bought this nail file. It is so awesome! I was able to file down my nails without causing any damage. And it didn't require a ton of strokes. So easy, so smooth. I love it. The case is so nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love this file & case
customer_reviews.text: I had one for a couple years and my son dropped it on the tile floor and it broke. My heart broke with it. Will be ordering again because I loved it so much, the only nail file I need! I buy the pink case one 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Chalupa Troopa

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come broken, in came in super early, and works super well! I love it, but!! IT FEELS TERRIBLE TO FILE MY NATURAL NAILS WITH IT. But since I wear fake ones I don't really need to worry about that. Otherwise this product is g o l d
customer_reviews.author: CuddlyKittyc:

customer_reviews.title: File a nail
customer_reviews.text: This is my first glass nail file. And I love it. I will never go back to Emery boards again. It gets rid of my hang nails. So far I fiIe my nails in both directions. have only had it for a week and I can't wait to wash it to see how much grit it has.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, glass fingernail file
customer_reviews.text: This is the smoothest nail file I've ever used. I accidentally stepped on my last one which I've had for about 10 years, I was so excited to find the same one to order again. Absolutely love it. The metal files chew up my nails, then they split. This one is gentle on my nails but extremely efficient
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Classy Lady Glass Nail File
customer_reviews.text: Classy Lady Glass Nail File arrived very much on time. I really like it. It's very effective and easy to use. The only drawback was the packaging. The box that the case came in was smashed, as a result the case was damaged and the shiny end piece came off. That's the only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Phillyb5210

customer_reviews.title: The best file out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great nail file. I no longer use emery boards. This file does such a wonderful job on my nail and does not leave any rough edges. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Seraphimrose

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Glass File!
customer_reviews.text: This glass nail file is very nicely made. It works great for filing nails. The product was exactly as described. It is also a very pretty file.
customer_reviews.author: D. Booth

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice case, works well. The grit is initially rough, but as you use it a couple times it wears down a little and ends up being perfect for shaping and finishing.
customer_reviews.author: noky64

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I ordered this as a gift for a friend and it is great. Great product, classy case, and no fuss service on order and receipt. This would be a perfect idea for stocking stuffers at Christmas or a simple, classy gift throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: LLL Texas

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Case is cheap looking but that doesn’t concern me.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Great file, very quick for filing.
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous. I have bought others that wouldn't file nails at all. These are great and do a quick job. I gave three away and kept two for myself, one for my purse and one by my chair. These are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret1411

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful file. I have been using crystal files for ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful file. I have been using crystal files for years. They are gentle on your nails. All you have to do is wipe the file after using and you will see that there are no marks on the file. I only need to replace files because we have ceramic tile floors and I tend to drop things. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: It's an inferior product
customer_reviews.text: 👎👎 ClassyLady Professional Glass Nail File is a poorly-made product. It's not even worth the 'One Star' rating that i'm forced to give. I'm shocked Amazon carries such junk.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little nail file!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I couldn't imagine how a "glass" nail file could even work, but I have been very pleased with this product. It files my nails well leaving them smooth as they should be. The case is very nice and the pink is a lovely shade. Cleaning is a breeze. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t accidentally break it.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a glass nail file for many years until I finally broke it. I began searching for another one and found this and really like this one as much as the first one I had. For me, it works so much better than any other nail file.
customer_reviews.author: Carryon

customer_reviews.title: The file is attractive and has a nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and can't really give a comment on the product. The file is attractive and has a nice carrying case. The only thing I can say is the pretty pink box was smashed when received. This is the fault of the shipper, not your company, but thought you might need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as Christmas gifts for the girls in my family. I bought one for myself last year and absolutely loved it. I uses it almost daily and it's as good as it was the day I got it, therefore they will fill my gift stockings this year.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I received this file about a week ago. Love it! It leaves the edges of my very sad nails so smooth, much better than an Emory board. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: john h

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The file is great, very sturdy. I just can’t deal with the sound/feel of it, it makes me cringe, but that’s just my own personal issue - nothing wrong with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lance & Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my granddaughter who was delighted. I just purchased one for myself. Wow! I have read used such an awesome file. This will make a great gift for family and friends. Mary Hunt's daily messages first brought this to my attention.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Leake

customer_reviews.title: Works god
customer_reviews.text: Feels like teeth on caulk board but does the job good lol
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: File leaves nail edge super smooth. Love the case also. Best file I've ever had so far. Still love the file although it has started to come apart in areas. Even so, I decided to buy more to give for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Really smooth....
customer_reviews.text: REally nice. I have always used a metal file, but now I will always use the glass file. It is so smooth. Does such a nice job. Highly recommend it. 8/22/16 Like it so much, I just ordered another as backup.
customer_reviews.author: patricia strain

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it !
customer_reviews.text: I had searched for perfect glass files for several years. So glad to find this ! High quality file and beautiful color of file and cover. Will order another one soon. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Kata

customer_reviews.title: Love this file!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this glass file! It's the only kind of file that doesn't actually scratch and leave rough edges on your nails! From now on, it's the only thing I'm going to use!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Sheetz

customer_reviews.title: 1st time user of glass
customer_reviews.text: works so much better than emery or so called diamond boards. wont use anything else now
customer_reviews.author: kurt

customer_reviews.title: Professional is correct.
customer_reviews.text: This nail file is exactly as described. Good quality, good results upon use, and the case is icing on the cake...I will buy this again, as well as for "just thinking of you" gifts. I will also look for other ClassyLady products.
customer_reviews.author: irene

customer_reviews.title: I am simply amazed. My nails have been peeling and splitting for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am simply amazed. My nails have been peeling and splitting for years and there was not one product that helped. Believe me, I have spent a lot of money on every nail menders available. Lot's of money and no help. This crystal nail file is miraculous. Using this to file my nails gave me a straight edge with no nooks and crannies that would ascerbate the problem. Get rid of your emery boards they just make the problem worse. I would also recommend using oil (Vitamin E, Olive oil etc.) in order to moisturize your nails then removing the oil prior to putting on your base coat.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best nail file I have used.
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail file! It really makes my nails smooth and beats the emery boards and other files I have used in the past. I like that is has a protective case. After I confirmed I liked mine, I ordered ones for my sister and my daughter who both have birthdays coming up. I will be anxious to see if they like theirs. I appreciated being able to read other people's comments and reviews before ordering one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already!
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the fence about buying this nail file, just do it already. I am sad I waited so long. It doesn't wear down and the tip is perfect for cleaning up your nails. Wish I would have bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Farley

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: These crystal nail files are fantastic. Now that I use them, everything else got tossed. These file quickly and leave your nails smooth.
customer_reviews.author: heyjudesings

customer_reviews.title: I love the way they file the nails without leaving "nail ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about these glass nail files. I love the way they file the nails without leaving "nail dust" on and around the nails. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them.  Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Was glad I ordered them. Work great. Glad the grit is on the side too. Got them and ordered 2 more. Nice files and you won't be disappointed in them.
customer_reviews.author: DJM51

customer_reviews.title: Happy nails!
customer_reviews.text: My order shipped out very shortly after I ordered and arrived in perfect condition. I've used it once so far and it seems to be exactly what I was looking for. I'm hoping it doesn't wear down quickly like some other brands tend to do.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this quality file & case!
customer_reviews.text: Item as pictured, arrived fast in perfect condition. High quality file with case works beautifully on my fragile nails. Very glad I found this file, I would purchase again & recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent crystal glass nail file
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glass nail file with strong protective cover, love the rose pink color. I can easily find it in my purse and it is protected from breakage, both reasons for purchase. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: MinneJoTa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glass file. I lost the one I had for years and this one replaced it. This will last you a long time and it's good to carry in your purse for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great nail file!
customer_reviews.text: Great nail file! I recently got my fake nails taken off after having them on for 3 years, they are in rough shape! I was doing some research on how to care for brittle nails and I saw that using a glass nail file was the best option to keep them short without splitting until they get strong again. I feel like it does make my nail edges very smooth and helps them not snag on anything. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one is high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love glass files. The case protects it in your purse. Don't file too aggressively though. It will take down your nail in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P.

customer_reviews.title: It's a very useful tool. Very unlike any filer I've used before
customer_reviews.text: It's a very useful tool. Very unlike any filer I've used before. My nails look great! I also really enjoy the convenient travel case for my purse
customer_reviews.author: Liddy

customer_reviews.title: Best nail file!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail file! Will never go back to regular emery boards.
customer_reviews.author: Wagon

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of the file and sturdy case!
customer_reviews.text: Received it quickly and in excellent shape. Good quality and thicker than the previous file I bought from somewhere else. Love the sturdy case because my previous one only came with a plastic sleeve protector. Unfortunately it didn't protect it very well when it slipped out onto the floor and I stepped on it accidentally and broke it in half. This case will prevent that!
customer_reviews.author: page wiz

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered this file to carry with me. I have not used it because I'm afraid to carry it because the case will not stay closed. The file could easily break. For the price I expected better craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: great gift idea for women OR MEN
customer_reviews.text: i can't say enough good things about these frosted nail files
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K Rohr

customer_reviews.title: Best nail file I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have weak, ridged nails and this file is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Alger

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FILE
customer_reviews.text: I love this glass file!!!!! so much better than metal or card board files. And yes, if you use this file you will be a Classy Lady.
customer_reviews.author: marcie

customer_reviews.title: No File in Case
customer_reviews.text: I received the package with the pretty pink case, that was empty. Not a file in it. Says no returns, but Amazon credited my account. Disappointing. I'll be ordering from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara A Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This is the second file I bought & love it. I dropped my first one on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second file I bought & love it. I dropped my first one on the bathroom floor & it broke in half.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Love

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This nail file exceeded my expectations! It really lives up to its name of Classy Lady; the file itself is elegant and it comes with a nice carrying tube. It is quicker to file my nails down with this file than with a typical one found at drugstores. My nails get nice smooth edges.
customer_reviews.author: Kales

customer_reviews.title: CLASSY LADY NAIL FILE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE FIRST TIME I HAVE USED A GLASS NAIL FILE. IT DOES THE JOB. SO FAR IT SEEMS TO WORK JUST FINE.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hart

customer_reviews.title: never buy another file again!
customer_reviews.text: No need to ever buy another nail file again!! I absolutely love this thing! It files so smoothly, doesn't leave rough edges. The case is not sturdy though and feels like its made of plastic so hopefully it doesn't crack on me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Best nail file I've ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my glass file, the case is perfect for all sizes of purses. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Beverlee Cholewa

customer_reviews.title: Nice little item
customer_reviews.text: Nice little item. Stays usable and files nicely. Can't figure out how to successfully harden my nails naturally, still breaking, but this item keeps them from peeling
customer_reviews.author: C. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this file and protective case. Just hope I don't drop this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Kolorado

customer_reviews.title: Great Nail File
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful nail file. Keeps my nails smooth so no snagging on clothes. Love the case it comes in that protects the nail file.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: ClassyLady Great Nail File
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail file! It it gently yet effective when filing my nails and it comes in a case. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kerbow

customer_reviews.title: Classy lady Nile file
customer_reviews.text: I love how pretty they are! They work better than any other I've had
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, quality nail file
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a high quality nail file. It works quickly and comfortable to smooth rough edges and shape my natural nails nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri E. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicest and prettiest nail file I have ever used. Look out family--stocking stuffers:-)
customer_reviews.author: Liv J

customer_reviews.title: Great on fragile nails!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fragile nails and this nail file allows me to shape and smooth my nails without tearing them and causing more damage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.text: Never gets gunked up. High quality. Trims the nails gently so you never take too much off.

customer_reviews.title: Classy Lady is way better, right from the first swipe
customer_reviews.text: you think all nail files are the same? No way, Classy Lady is way better, right from the first swipe. You can immediately see how it closes the nail layers, helping to limit peeling, so common with thin fragile nails. I will buy more, to keep in my purse and around the house. This product is finally making a difference in my nails !
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: I switched and am a believer now of ......
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nail file. All these years I've been using the metal ones, but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Emiki

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My nails have always been soft, and as I get older, they are constantly splitting. I'm learning classical guitar, and this has been very problematic, since I need my nails to play well! I've never seen a crystal glass nail file. It files in such a gentle and exact way. I'm excited about having finally solved my aggravating nail problem!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannemarie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying in purse
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for regarding a glass nail file. Comes in a protective case which is perfect for carrying in my purse.

product_meta.title: ClassyLady Professional Glass Nail File - Glass Nail File Case, Nails File, Glass Finger Nail Files, Crystal Nail File, Glass Nail & File, Crystal Nail Files
feature_bullets: SUPER DURABLE AND NEVER WEARS; our professional crystal glass nail file with case are the only nails file you will ever need and as can be as gentle as a baby nail file set
BEST CRYSTAL NAIL FILE FOR YOUR HANDBAG so you can have it with you all the time. No need for false nails with this nails file

STRONG AND HARDENED our Nail Files undergo extra hardening during production. Ensures long term performance and makes it more difficult to break compared to cheaper files as well as last as long as a metal nail file
SLIM AND SLEEK to work with and makes nail filing a breeze
LOW MAINTENANCE; just wash glass nail files with warm soapy water to maintain top performance of your crystal nail file
